properties.body:
EASTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
CYPRUS.
DNC 10.
1. VESSEL, SEVEN PERSONS ON BOARD, DISABLED AND ADRIFT
   IN VICINITY 35-00.00N 035-00.00E. VESSELS IN VICINITY
   REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
   REPORTS TO JRCC LARNACA,
   PHONE: 357-2464-3005,
   FAX: +357-24643254,
   INMARSAT-C: 421099999.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 2109/22.
